description: Tom is a self-defense instructor who knows the importance of treating women right. The majority of his students are female, and he loves the fact that he is able to teach them how to protect themselves.He has a girlfriend that he cares a lot for, and he knows what it's like to worry about her safety. Tom is in terrific shape, worksout constantly, and likes quiet evenings cuddled up with his woman in front of his plasma TV and a good movie.Good work, Tom. Your girlfriend is lucky to have you.
title: Tom
